description.brief: Base component that is aware of Qt threading requirements

package.description: This project's component is meant to be used as a base class for others. It provides hooks matching the RTT hooks, but running in the Qt main thread, as well as a method to synchronously "call" other methods from the RTT thread, to be run in the Qt thread
package.author: Sylvain Joyeux/sylvain.joyeux@tidewise.io
